description: For engineering teams whom require an in depth understanding of spend in their account

options.content:
Cost Optimization And Savings Tool (COAST) - Engineering Dashboard

The Engineering Dashboard serves as a versatile tool designed for engineering teams, offering insights into cost and usage metrics. This dashboard can be implemented at either the payer level or within individual accounts, catering to various organizational needs.

To make the most of the Engineering Dashboard's capabilities, follow these steps:

  1. Service Selection: Begin by navigating to the Services menu. Here, you can select the AWS services you wish to monitor and analyze.
  2. Tag Configuration: Proceed to the tag key menu and choose the relevant tag key associated with your project. Subsequently, select all the tag values that you intend to visualize for the chosen tag key. It's essential to wait for the tag values to populate after selecting the tag key to ensure accurate data representation.
  3. Optional Filters: For further customization, the dashboard offers optional filtering options. You can filter data by specific regions or, if operating at the payer level, you have the flexibility to apply filters based on individual accounts.

panels.title: Engineering - Summary View  - tag key: $TagKey value(s): $TagValue

options.content:
Period Trends View

This view provides a high level overview of spend and spend trends. This view will not filter by services, thus the selection of services from the Services menu will have no impact on these visualizations.

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$Granularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  sum(line_item_unblended_cost) AS cost
FROM $CurTable
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  AND line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT
  sum(line_item_unblended_cost) AS cost
FROM $CurTable
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  AND  line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)

SELECT
  date_trunc('$Granularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  line_item_product_code as product,
  CAST(SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as INTEGER) as cost
from $CurTable
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  AND line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
GROUP BY 1, 2
HAVING CAST(SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as INTEGER) > 1
ORDER BY 1
;

SELECT
  line_item_product_code as product,
  sum(line_item_blended_cost) as cost
from $CurTable
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  AND  line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 1
;

panels.title: Top Spend Service For Selected Period

targets.rawSQL:
select 
  line_item_product_code as product,
  sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost
from $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  -- AND line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1
order by cost DESC
LIMIT 10

select 
  date_trunc('$Granularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  product_location as location,
  CAST(SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as INTEGER) as cost
from $CurTable
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  AND  line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
GROUP BY 1, 2
HAVING CAST(SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as INTEGER) > 1
ORDER BY 1
;

select 
  date_trunc('$Granularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  product_location as location,
  sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost
from $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND product_location in ($Regions)
  AND line_item_product_code in ($Services)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1, 2
having
 sum(line_item_unblended_cost) > 1
order by 1

SELECT 
-- date_trunc('$Granularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
line_item_product_code,
round(sum(round(line_item_unblended_cost,2))) AS cost
FROM $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  and product_location in ($Regions)
  AND line_item_product_code in ('$Services')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
GROUP BY  
line_item_product_code
ORDER BY  
cost desc;

select 
  line_item_usage_start_date as time,
  line_item_product_code as product,
  sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost
from $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND product_location in ($Regions)
  and line_item_product_code in ('$Services')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select 
  line_item_usage_start_date as time,
  line_item_product_code as product,
  sum(line_item_usage_amount) as usage
from $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND product_location in ($Regions)
  AND line_item_product_code in ('$Services')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select 
  bill_billing_period_start_date as time,
  line_item_product_code as product,
  sum(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost
from $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(bill_billing_period_start_date)
  AND product_location in ($Regions)
  AND line_item_product_code in ('$Services')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1, 2
order by 1

select 
  bill_billing_period_start_date as time,
  line_item_product_code as product,
  sum(line_item_usage_amount) as usage
from $CurTable
where
  $__timeFilter(bill_billing_period_start_date)
  AND product_location in ($Regions)
  and line_item_product_code in ('$Services')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id IN ($LinkedAccounts)
  AND resource_tags_user_$TagKey IN ($TagValue)
  AND line_item_line_item_type IN ($ChargeType)
group by 1, 2
order by 1

query.rawSQL: select distinct product_location from $CurTable where product_location != '';

SELECT  distinct line_item_product_code
FROM $CurTable
--WHERE  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
GROUP BY  line_item_product_code
HAVING round(sum(round(line_item_blended_cost,2)),2) > 0
ORDER BY  line_item_product_code desc;
SELECT DISTINCT(resource_tags_user_$TagKey) FROM $CurTable WHERE resource_tags_user_$TagKey IS NOT NULL AND NOT resource_tags_user_$TagKey = '';
